headline: Are you ready to solve the third series?
text: The third series is here and waiting for you to solve it. Are you interested in how much you pay for electricity or would you rather solve problems beyond our solar system? The new series offers you all this and much more.

headline: Registration to Fyziklani is open now!
text: Did you enjoy Physics Brawl Online? Would you like to visit Prague? Don't hesitate, create a team of up to 5 members and register right now. The competition takes place on 10th February 2023. Winners get valuable prizes and imperishable fame.

headline: Physics Brawl Online - 904, 59!
text: These are the numbers describing this year's Physics Brawl Online. 904 teams from 59 countries took part in the competition to show their skills in solving physics problems. We congratulate the winners and wish all the participants a lot of success in the future.
